'''Day of the Flame's Return''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[Footprints of the Traveler (CN)|Footprints of the Traveler]]''. It is currently available on the Chinese release of ''Footprints of the Traveler'' only.

It was added in the album on March 14, 2025, on QQ Music.
